metadata.name: Pink Tape
metadata.description:
In this work, I tried to express the vivid outbursts of anger of people with mental disorders.
I understand more than anyone what it is.
A little history about this NFT.
There was a moment when I almost finished my musical project, it took several hours, when suddenly my DAW freezes and I understand that I did not save the project (unfortunately my laptop is already old and this often happens), I canâ€™t do anything, I waited for minutes 30 in the hope that everything will return, but no, the situation was inevitable, 3 a.m., a mug of coffee, disappointment, repeated work, I even remember how I recorded the melody that stuck on the recorder so as not to forget it.
Bottom line: I did even better than before >-<
At the time of writing this text, my clock is 2:13 pm, I think it's time to go to bed. 
You know, I remember how in my childhood I wanted to become a writer, and in fact, being one, I probably can be happy with myself, but it's too early to be happy.
The gif was also made by me.
